title: SolidlyAI
description:
Be organized. Be attentive. Be confident. Solidly Meet empowers you to have better meetings. Our AI notetaker captures every detail. You focus on being present and engaged. People use SolidlyAI because:

1) No bot joins your meetings
2) It works with ANY meeting platform
3) of it's affordable pricing – right now it’s only $0.01 per meeting minute! And, it's only going to get more affordable over time.
